Title: Technical Assistant (m/w/d)
Description:
Unternehmensbeschreibung

Die Syngenta Group, ein weltweit führendes Unternehmen in der Agrartechnologie und Innovation, beschäftigt 60.000 Menschen in über 100 Ländern, um die Landwirtschaft durch maßgeschneiderte Lösungen für Landwirte, die Gesellschaft und unseren Planeten zu transformieren. Unser vielfältiges Portfolio umfasst Saatgut, Pflanzenschutz, Ernährungsprodukte, agronomische Lösungen und digitale Dienstleistungen, die alle darauf ausgerichtet sind, Landwirten bei der Produktion gesunder Nahrungsmittel, Futtermittel, Fasern und Kraftstoffe zu helfen und dabei natürliche Ressourcen zu schonen und die Umwelt zu schützen. Unsere Mission ist es, kritische Herausforderungen wie den Klimawandel und die Ernährungssicherheit durch nachhaltige Praktiken und hochmoderne Lösungen anzugehen und gleichzeitig die Ressourcen des Planeten zu schützen.

Syngenta Crop Protection, die größte Geschäftseinheit der Syngenta Group, ist führend in nachhaltigen Landwirtschaftslösungen und bietet innovative Produkte an, um Pflanzen von der Aussaat bis zur Ernte gesund zu erhalten und gleichzeitig die Umweltauswirkungen zu minimieren.

Syngenta wurde vom Science Magazine als Top-Arbeitgeber eingestuft und alle Schweizer Standorte wurden mit dem Label "Friendly Work Space" ausgezeichnet: Lesen Sie hier mehr darüber: https://friendlyworkspace.ch/de/das-label/das-sind-die-label-friendly-work-space-betriebe

Stellenbeschreibung

Koordinieren aller technischen Aktivitäten im Zusammenhang mit einer oder mehreren Produktionslinien und Bereitstellen von technischem Fachwissen zu aktuellen Fragen, zum Beispiel für die Identifizierung und Umsetzung von Initiativen zur kontinuierlichen Verbesserung.

Einbringen von Anlagenwissen, um während des Standortauswahlprozesses die besten Optionen zu ermitteln (Senkung der Investitionskosten für Projekte) und Fungieren als Schlüsselmitglied des Projektteams für die Einführung neuer Prozesse als Vertreter des Herstellers und zukünftigen Benutzers.

HSEQ (Health, Safety, Environment, Quality)


Ordnungsgemäßer Betrieb einer oder mehrerer Produktionsanlagen in Übereinstimmung mit den geltenden HSEQ-Regeln und -Standards.
Unterstützung eines hohen HSEQ-Standards für die Dokumentation gemäß internen und externen Richtlinien.
Beitrag zur kontinuierlichen Verbesserung der Standards und Prozesse des Betriebs (HSEQ, OPEX).
Proaktives Teilen von umfangreichem technischem Fachwissen mit dem Team und Teilnahme an PRAs und WRAs bei Bedarf.


Produktionsunterstützung


Ansprechpartner und Know-How-Träger für fachspezifische Prozessbelange
Nutzen von umfangreichem technischem Fachwissen und effektiver Zusammenarbeit mit Standortsupport-Diensten (z.B. Engineering, Process Technology, QC, getec) bei Problemlösung und Prozessverbesserungen.
Initiierung, Implementierung und Dokumentation kontinuierlicher Prozessverbesserungen in der Produktion; Koordination von Produktionsversuchen zur Unterstützung von Lernkurven, Initiativen zur Kapazitätssteigerung und Troubleshooting.
Unterstützung des Produktionschemikers bei der Instruktion der Betriebsmitarbeiter vor Kampagnenbeginn.
Beaufsichtigung eines Teams aus mehreren Betriebsmitarbeitern bei der Anlagenreinigung vor und nach der Kampagne, um die Verfügbarkeit der Anlagen gemäß dem festgelegten Zeitplan zu gewährleisten.
Erstellung oder Unterstützung bei der Erstellung von Dokumenten (z.B. Betriebsvorschrift, Reinigungsvorschrift, Arbeitsanweisungen, Checklisten, Risikoanalysen).
Verantwortung für die Erstellung und Verbesserung der Produktions- und Reinigungsrezepte im Prozessleitsystem (DeltaV).
Beitragen zu den Studien und Arbeiten für die Einführung neuer Produkte (Standortkalkulation, isometrische Validierung, Bereitstellung der Anlagen für das Projekt) als Teil des Projektteams und des Inbetriebnahmeteams.
Koordination der Versorgung mit Rohstoffen, Verpackungen, Verbrauchsmaterialien sowie der Deklaration und des Versands der Produkte (Zwischenprodukte und Wirkstoffe) in Übereinstimmung mit dem Produktionsplan zusammen mit Planung und Logistik


Qualifikationen


Ausgezeichnete Kenntnisse von Anlagen und Verfahren (Technik, R+I Schema, Chemische Prozesse). Mindestens 10 Jahre Erfahung in der chemischen Produktion als Chemikant, Chemie- und Pharmatechnologe, Schichtleiter, Prozessassistent oder in einer vergleichbaren Rolle.
Gute Kenntnis der HSEQ-Standards in der chemischen Produktion
Gute Kenntnisse in der Automation von chemischen Prozessen (Erfahrung mit Produktionsrezepten im DeltaV von Vorteil)
Gutes Verständnis der Grundlagen und Grenzen der verschiedenen vor Ort angewandten Risikoanalysen (Prozessrisikoanalyse, Arbeitsbereichanalyse, Arbeitsgenehmigung, Management of Change).
Gute allgemeine Kenntnisse über finanzielle Aspekte einer chemischen Anlage, kontinuierliche Verbesserung und Änderungsmanagement
Sehr gutes Deutsch in Wort und Schrift erforderlich; Englisch- oder Französischkenntnisse von Vorteil
Beherrschung gängiger Computerprogramme (Office, Visio). SAP Kenntnisse sind von Vorteil.
Fähigkeit, technische und betriebliche Probleme auf strukturierte Weise zu lösen
Demonstrierte Fähigkeiten zur Mitarbeiterführung von Vorteil
Fähigkeit, sich in einem sich ständig verändernden Umfeld weiterzuentwickeln und schnell auf Notsituationen zu reagieren.
Fähigkeit, mehrere Aktivitäten gleichzeitig zu verwalten.
Fokus auf Ergebnisse und Kundenzufriedenheit


Zusätzliche Informationen


Wir bieten eine Position, die zu wertvoller und wirkungsvoller Arbeit in einem anregenden und internationalen Umfeld beiträgt.
Flexible Arbeitsregelungen und ein Umfeld mit offener Kultur und vielfältiger Belegschaft
Mit Ihrer Arbeit können Sie einen wichtigen Betrag zur Ernährungssicherheit der Menschen leisten -> #bringingplantpotentialtolife
Wir bieten ein offenes und angenehmes Arbeitsklima
Wir respektieren uns und arbeiten zusammen auf Augenhöhe
Exklusive Rabatte und Vergünstigungen für Mitarbeitende


Fühlen Sie sich angesprochen? Wir freuen uns auf Ihre komplette Onlinebewerbung inklusive Lebenslaufs, Anschreiben, Diplome und Zeugnisse.

Syngenta ist ein Arbeitgeber für Chancengleichheit und diskriminiert nicht bei Recruitment, Einstellung, Ausbildung, Beförderung oder anderen Beschäftigungspraktiken aus Gründen der Rasse, der Hautfarbe, der Religion, des Geschlechts, der nationalen Herkunft, des Alters, der sexuellen Orientierung, des Familienstandes oder des Veteranenstatus, der Behinderung oder jedes anderen gesetzlich geschützten Status.
Show more
HTML:
Unternehmensbeschreibung

Die Syngenta Group, ein weltweit führendes Unternehmen in der Agrartechnologie und Innovation, beschäftigt 60.000 Menschen in über 100 Ländern, um die Landwirtschaft durch maßgeschneiderte Lösungen für Landwirte, die Gesellschaft und unseren Planeten zu transformieren. Unser vielfältiges Portfolio umfasst Saatgut, Pflanzenschutz, Ernährungsprodukte, agronomische Lösungen und digitale Dienstleistungen, die alle darauf ausgerichtet sind, Landwirten bei der Produktion gesunder Nahrungsmittel, Futtermittel, Fasern und Kraftstoffe zu helfen und dabei natürliche Ressourcen zu schonen und die Umwelt zu schützen. Unsere Mission ist es, kritische Herausforderungen wie den Klimawandel und die Ernährungssicherheit durch nachhaltige Praktiken und hochmoderne Lösungen anzugehen und gleichzeitig die Ressourcen des Planeten zu schützen.

Syngenta Crop Protection, die größte Geschäftseinheit der Syngenta Group, ist führend in nachhaltigen Landwirtschaftslösungen und bietet innovative Produkte an, um Pflanzen von der Aussaat bis zur Ernte gesund zu erhalten und gleichzeitig die Umweltauswirkungen zu minimieren.

Syngenta wurde vom Science Magazine als Top-Arbeitgeber eingestuft und alle Schweizer Standorte wurden mit dem Label "Friendly Work Space" ausgezeichnet: Lesen Sie hier mehr darüber: https://friendlyworkspace.ch/de/das-label/das-sind-die-label-friendly-work-space-betriebe

Stellenbeschreibung

Koordinieren aller technischen Aktivitäten im Zusammenhang mit einer oder mehreren Produktionslinien und Bereitstellen von technischem Fachwissen zu aktuellen Fragen, zum Beispiel für die Identifizierung und Umsetzung von Initiativen zur kontinuierlichen Verbesserung.

Einbringen von Anlagenwissen, um während des Standortauswahlprozesses die besten Optionen zu ermitteln (Senkung der Investitionskosten für Projekte) und Fungieren als Schlüsselmitglied des Projektteams für die Einführung neuer Prozesse als Vertreter des Herstellers und zukünftigen Benutzers.

HSEQ (Health, Safety, Environment, Quality)

  • Ordnungsgemäßer Betrieb einer oder mehrerer Produktionsanlagen in Übereinstimmung mit den geltenden HSEQ-Regeln und -Standards.
  • Unterstützung eines hohen HSEQ-Standards für die Dokumentation gemäß internen und externen Richtlinien.
  • Beitrag zur kontinuierlichen Verbesserung der Standards und Prozesse des Betriebs (HSEQ, OPEX).
  • Proaktives Teilen von umfangreichem technischem Fachwissen mit dem Team und Teilnahme an PRAs und WRAs bei Bedarf.

Produktionsunterstützung

  • Ansprechpartner und Know-How-Träger für fachspezifische Prozessbelange
  • Nutzen von umfangreichem technischem Fachwissen und effektiver Zusammenarbeit mit Standortsupport-Diensten (z.B. Engineering, Process Technology, QC, getec) bei Problemlösung und Prozessverbesserungen.
  • Initiierung, Implementierung und Dokumentation kontinuierlicher Prozessverbesserungen in der Produktion; Koordination von Produktionsversuchen zur Unterstützung von Lernkurven, Initiativen zur Kapazitätssteigerung und Troubleshooting.
  • Unterstützung des Produktionschemikers bei der Instruktion der Betriebsmitarbeiter vor Kampagnenbeginn.
  • Beaufsichtigung eines Teams aus mehreren Betriebsmitarbeitern bei der Anlagenreinigung vor und nach der Kampagne, um die Verfügbarkeit der Anlagen gemäß dem festgelegten Zeitplan zu gewährleisten.
  • Erstellung oder Unterstützung bei der Erstellung von Dokumenten (z.B. Betriebsvorschrift, Reinigungsvorschrift, Arbeitsanweisungen, Checklisten, Risikoanalysen).
  • Verantwortung für die Erstellung und Verbesserung der Produktions- und Reinigungsrezepte im Prozessleitsystem (DeltaV).
  • Beitragen zu den Studien und Arbeiten für die Einführung neuer Produkte (Standortkalkulation, isometrische Validierung, Bereitstellung der Anlagen für das Projekt) als Teil des Projektteams und des Inbetriebnahmeteams.
  • Koordination der Versorgung mit Rohstoffen, Verpackungen, Verbrauchsmaterialien sowie der Deklaration und des Versands der Produkte (Zwischenprodukte und Wirkstoffe) in Übereinstimmung mit dem Produktionsplan zusammen mit Planung und Logistik

Qualifikationen

  • Ausgezeichnete Kenntnisse von Anlagen und Verfahren (Technik, R+I Schema, Chemische Prozesse). Mindestens 10 Jahre Erfahung in der chemischen Produktion als Chemikant, Chemie- und Pharmatechnologe, Schichtleiter, Prozessassistent oder in einer vergleichbaren Rolle.
  • Gute Kenntnis der HSEQ-Standards in der chemischen Produktion
  • Gute Kenntnisse in der Automation von chemischen Prozessen (Erfahrung mit Produktionsrezepten im DeltaV von Vorteil)
  • Gutes Verständnis der Grundlagen und Grenzen der verschiedenen vor Ort angewandten Risikoanalysen (Prozessrisikoanalyse, Arbeitsbereichanalyse, Arbeitsgenehmigung, Management of Change).
  • Gute allgemeine Kenntnisse über finanzielle Aspekte einer chemischen Anlage, kontinuierliche Verbesserung und Änderungsmanagement
  • Sehr gutes Deutsch in Wort und Schrift erforderlich; Englisch- oder Französischkenntnisse von Vorteil
  • Beherrschung gängiger Computerprogramme (Office, Visio). SAP Kenntnisse sind von Vorteil.
  • Fähigkeit, technische und betriebliche Probleme auf strukturierte Weise zu lösen
  • Demonstrierte Fähigkeiten zur Mitarbeiterführung von Vorteil
  • Fähigkeit, sich in einem sich ständig verändernden Umfeld weiterzuentwickeln und schnell auf Notsituationen zu reagieren.
  • Fähigkeit, mehrere Aktivitäten gleichzeitig zu verwalten.
  • Fokus auf Ergebnisse und Kundenzufriedenheit

Zusätzliche Informationen

  • Wir bieten eine Position, die zu wertvoller und wirkungsvoller Arbeit in einem anregenden und internationalen Umfeld beiträgt.
  • Flexible Arbeitsregelungen und ein Umfeld mit offener Kultur und vielfältiger Belegschaft
  • Mit Ihrer Arbeit können Sie einen wichtigen Betrag zur Ernährungssicherheit der Menschen leisten -> #bringingplantpotentialtolife
  • Wir bieten ein offenes und angenehmes Arbeitsklima
  • Wir respektieren uns und arbeiten zusammen auf Augenhöhe
  • Exklusive Rabatte und Vergünstigungen für Mitarbeitende

Fühlen Sie sich angesprochen? Wir freuen uns auf Ihre komplette Onlinebewerbung inklusive Lebenslaufs, Anschreiben, Diplome und Zeugnisse.

Syngenta ist ein Arbeitgeber für Chancengleichheit und diskriminiert nicht bei Recruitment, Einstellung, Ausbildung, Beförderung oder anderen Beschäftigungspraktiken aus Gründen der Rasse, der Hautfarbe, der Religion, des Geschlechts, der nationalen Herkunft, des Alters, der sexuellen Orientierung, des Familienstandes oder des Veteranenstatus, der Behinderung oder jedes anderen gesetzlich geschützten Status.

Title: Online Data Analyst
Description:
Are you a detail-oriented individual with a passion for research and a good understanding of national and local geography? This freelance opportunity allows you to work at your own pace and from the comfort of your own home.

A Day in the Life of an Online Data Analyst:

In this role, you will be working on a project aimed at enhancing the content and quality of digital maps that are used by millions of people worldwide
Completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment such as verifying and comparing data, and determining the relevance and accuracy of information.

Join us today and be part of a dynamic and innovative team that is making a difference in the world!

TELUS Digital AI Community

Our global AI Community is a vibrant network of 1 million+ contributors from diverse backgrounds who help our customers collect, enhance, train, translate, and localize content to build better AI models. Become part of our growing community and make an impact supporting the machine learning models of some of the world’s largest brands.







Qualification Path




No previous professional experience is required to apply to this role, however, working on this project will require you to pass the basic requirements and go through a standard assessment process. This is a part-time long-term project and your work will be subject to our standard quality assurance checks during the term of this agreement.




Basic Requirements

Full Professional Proficiency in English & German language
Being a resident in Switzerland for the last 2 consecutive years and having familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media, and cultural affairs in Switzerland
Ability to follow guidelines and conduct online research using search engines, online maps, and website information
Flexibility to work across a diverse set of task types, including maps, news, audio tasks, and relevance
Daily access to a broadband internet connection, computer, and relevant software




Assessment

In order to be hired into the program, you’ll take an open book qualification exam that will determine your suitability for the position and complete ID verification. Our team will provide you with guidelines and learning materials before your qualification exam. You will be required to complete the exam in a specific timeframe but at your convenience.




Equal Opportunity

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for a contractual relationship without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. At TELUS Digital AI, we are proud to offer equal opportunities and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive community. All aspects of selection are based on applicants’ qualifications, merits, competence, and performance without regard to any characteristic related to diversity.

Show more

Title: Software Developer (Off-Car Systems) Graduate
Description:
Join the Audi F1 Project - Shape the Future of Motorsport!

Welcome to the Audi F1 Project.    

   

Audi will be competing in the FIA Formula 1 World Championship from 2026. The new team has three locations. The Sauber Group's Formula 1 factory in Hinwil (Switzerland) is known for its innovative technologies and passion for racing. Audi's Motorsport Competence Center in Neuburg (Germany) is considered one of the most modern of its kind in Europe. We have recently opened Sauber Motorsport Technology Center in the UK. Our Power Unit comes from Neuburg, while Hinwil is responsible for the development of the chassis and race operations with support from the UK. 

 

We are now opening applications for our inaugural Graduate Programme. In your graduate role, you will contribute directly to live projects, gaining hands-on experience from day one.  

Continuous improvement is at the core of what we do. You will be encouraged to adapt and innovate, strengthening your skills and developing a growth mindset. Clear and effective communication, as well as constructive feedback, will be essential in helping you collaborate across teams. You will share knowledge openly and learn from the experience of your teammates. And we place great emphasis on ownership: you will take responsibility for your work, make informed decisions and understand how your contributions shape the wider team's success.

Your mission

As a graduate member of the Off-Car Systems team, you’ll focus on developing and maintaining software tools that ensure high-quality data flows seamlessly from the car to engineers and analysts. You’ll collaborate with performance, control systems, electronics, and data analysis teams to guarantee timely and reliable access to critical information. Your responsibilities include developing and testing software applications, managing data pipelines, and supporting system integration and troubleshooting. This role gives you the chance to work with cutting-edge software infrastructure, learn from experienced engineers across multiple disciplines, and make a direct impact on race performance in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment.

Key Responsibilities


Software Development and Maintenance
Design, develop, and maintain off-car systems software tools and applications.
Ensure software reliability and usability for engineers accessing car data.
Contribute to automated data processing pipelines and quality control systems.
Data Management and Analysis
Support the collection, delivery, storage, and processing of telemetry data.
Assist in validating and troubleshooting data streams from the car to end users.
Integration and Reliability
Participate in root cause analysis of software and data issues.
Propose improvements to software tools, workflows, and data infrastructure.

Your profile

Required Qualifications


A university degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical/Electronics Engineering, Mechatronics, or a related field.
Strong programming skills, particularly in Python, C++, C#, or MATLAB.
Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software design principles.
Familiarity with database systems and data pipelines.
Strong mathematical and data analysis skills.


Personal Attributes


Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Collaborative mindset with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
Creative and adaptable approach to problem-solving, with the ability to quickly develop solutions to complex challenges.
Show more

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Manpower

Experis® is a global leader in IT professional resourcing, permanent recruitment, project solutions, and managed services. With over 25 years of experience in Switzerland and offices in Zürich, Basel, and Geneva, we connect top IT talent with leading companies. Our mission is to help professionals unlock their potential and thrive in dynamic, future-ready careers.

Für einen Kunden in Zürich suchen wir einen Data Engineer für eine Festanstellung.

Deine Aufgaben


Beratung unserer Kunden im Bereich Datenmodellierung und Datenanlyse
Analyse von Bedürfnisse und Erarbeitung konkreter Lösungen
Unterstützung des Account Managements bei der Akquisition von Projekten


Deine Skills


Du bist ein Teamplayer
Du schätzt den direkten Kundenkontakt
Du bist lösungsorientiert, strukturiert und analytisch
Den Willen Neues zu lernen und dich stetig weiterzubilden


Dein Profil


Du hast Erfahrung in SQL und PL/SQL
Du hast Erfahrung mit Datenbanken (Oracle, MS-SQL, etc.)
Du hast eine gute mündliche und schriftliche Ausdrucksweise in Deutsch und Englisch
Du hast Erfahrung oder die Bereitschaft dir die Programmiersprache Python anzueignen
Du hast Erfahrung im Bereich der dimensionalen Datenmodellierung oder die Bereitschaft sie dir anzueignen
Du hast Erfahrung mit den gängigen ETL-Werkzeugen
Du hast erste Erfahrungen mit DWH und Big-Data (NoSQL, MapReduce, ?)
Du hast Erfahrung mit Daten(-analyse) in der Cloud (Azure, AWS, Snowflake, ?) oder bist bereit sie dir anzueignen
Du hast Erfahrung mit Datenanalyse und Reporting (MS Power BI, Tableau, ?


Wenn du an dieser Gelegenheit interessiert bist, freuen wir uns auf deinen CV.

Bei Fragen wende dich bitte an Vladyslav Kadaiev unter +41 58 307 2092.

Settore: Informatica

Ruolo: Risorse umane

Title: Etudiant / Etudiante
Description:
Mettre la main à la pâte. Faire avancer les choses. Les faire bouger. Un grand bol de chaleur humaine et un vrai esprit d’équipe. Et toujours franchir la ligne d'arrivée ensemble. Nous sommes Denner. Rejoins dès maintenant notre équipe gagnante.

Wichtige Hinweise: Merci d’envoyer ton dossier au complet.

Ce que tu accomplis


Utiliser la caisse et faire les décomptes
Veiller à l'ordre et à la propreté dans le magasin et le stock
Réceptionner les marchandises, les contrôler et les ranger dans ton magasin
Contrôler les dates de péremption des produits


Ce que tu apportes


Bildung: Étudiant*e (Uni/HES/ES) sans spécialisation particulière
Expérience professionnelle: Dans l’idéal, une première expérience professionnelle dans le commerce de détail est un avantage
Disposition à travailler de manière irrégulière - et de profiter du temps libre lorsque les autres travaillent
En bonne forme physique, certains colis pèsent jusqu'à 10 kilos
Attitude sociable et cordiale, état d’esprit positif
Français (bonnes connaissances)


Ce que nous te proposons


Partie du groupe Migros: Une marque forte, bien ancrée dans le commerce de détail au sein du Groupe Migros.
Rémunération equitable: 13 salaires par année et augmentations pour tout le monde au lieu de bonus pour une minorité.
Abonnement mobile: L’embarras du choix: abonnement Galaxus Mobile, Wingo ou Sunrise à partir de 10 francs.
Banque Migros: De meilleurs taux d'intérêts et moins de frais sur tes comptes privés, de placement ou hypothécaires.
Offres pour les collaborateurs: 10 pour cent de rabais sur le prochain gros achat (une fois par an).
Vacances: 6 semaines de vacances pour tout le monde et des jours supplémentaires pour les anniversaires de service.
Offre loisirs et culture: Des réductions auprès de sociétés de location de voitures, d'hôtels, d'événements et dans de nombreux autres domaines.


Seules les candidatures en ligne soumises via le portail seront prises en compte.

Processus de recrutement


Présélection des dossiers
Entretien personnel vidéo ou téléphonique
Travail à l’essai
Entretien professionnel
Offre et établissement du contrat


Contact

Madame Leticia Ogay

Recruteuse Vente Suisse romande

Vous n'avez pas trouvé de poste correspondant?

Active un abonnement de recherche afin de recevoir des offres d’emploi adaptées par e-mail. Créer un abonnement «poste vacant»
Show more

  • Banque Migros: De meilleurs taux d'intérêts et moins de frais sur tes comptes privés, de placement ou hypothécaires.
  • Offres pour les collaborateurs: 10 pour cent de rabais sur le prochain gros achat (une fois par an).
  • Vacances: 6 semaines de vacances pour tout le monde et des jours supplémentaires pour les anniversaires de service.
  • Offre loisirs et culture: Des réductions auprès de sociétés de location de voitures, d'hôtels, d'événements et dans de nombreux autres domaines.

Seules les candidatures en ligne soumises via le portail seront prises en compte.

Processus de recrutement

  • Présélection des dossiers
  • Entretien personnel vidéo ou téléphonique
  • Travail à l’essai
  • Entretien professionnel
  • Offre et établissement du contrat

Contact

Madame Leticia Ogay

Recruteuse Vente Suisse romande

Vous n'avez pas trouvé de poste correspondant?

Active un abonnement de recherche afin de recevoir des offres d’emploi adaptées par e-mail. Créer un abonnement «poste vacant»

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Description

CENTEGIX® is the industry leader in wearable safety technology for healthcare, education, government, and commercial workplaces with over 700,000 badges in use. The cloud-based CENTEGIX Safety Platform™ initiates the fastest response time for emergencies, from the everyday to the extreme. Leaders in over 15,000 locations nationwide trust CENTEGIX's innovative safety solutions to empower and protect people (every day).

Purpose

We are seeking a Data Engineer to join our Software Development team. You will maintain and improve our product data pipeline, help the team analyze data, enforce data hygiene, and implement best practices of data governance or our product data.

Reliable, high quality data is essential for sound decisions and accurate forecasts. As part of the data engineering domain, the Data Engineer ensures trusted product data reaches the right people across the organization, from Customer Service and Product to Operations, so we deliver a high quality customer experience.

Position Responsibilities


Building, maintaining, monitoring, troubleshooting, and improving data pipelines using a variety of ETL tools
Identifying and addressing data consistency and integrity issues
Completing data change requests where self-service options do not exist
Understanding our product, its data stores, and data pipelines to assist others in answering questions
Understanding and enforcing data governance policies
Leading the implementation of small projects
Supporting junior team members when appropriate
Communicating effectively with cross-functional team members
Creating and maintaining data domain documentation as needed


Requirements


1-3 years experience in data engineering or data analyst roles
Experience with ETL processes and tools
Proficiency with SQL
Proficiency with cloud data warehouses (e.g., Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery)
Proficiency with a variety of database products (e.g., MySQL, Postgres, MongoDB, Redis)
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Google Cloud Platform, AWS, Azure)
Excellent attention to detail
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Ability to adapt to evolving technologies and business processes
(Bonus) Familiarity with Python


What’s in it for you?


Remote first work environment; we offer workplace flexibility
Participation in company wide discretionary bonus (2026 eligible)
15 days paid time off(prorated)
11 paid holidays
Monthly device(s) reimbursement
Up to $2500/year reimbursement for eligible education expenses
We offer a range of Healthcare plans to meet your needs (medical, dental, vision)
401(k) Plan with 4% employer contribution to help you plan for the future
Employee Referral Bonus
Charitable Program Match


CENTEGIX is an equal opportunity employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind. We are committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at CENTEGIX are based on business needs, job requirements, and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, gender identity, and sexual orientation), national origin, age, disability, genetic information, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate

Title: Online Data Analyst
Description:
Are you a detail-oriented individual with a passion for research and a good understanding of national and local geography? This freelance opportunity allows you to work at your own pace and from the comfort of your own home.

A Day in the Life of an Online Data Analyst:

In this role, you will be working on a project aimed at enhancing the content and quality of digital maps that are used by millions of people worldwide
Completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment such as verifying and comparing data, and determining the relevance and accuracy of information.

Join us today and be part of a dynamic and innovative team that is making a difference in the world!

TELUS Digital AI Community

Our global AI Community is a vibrant network of 1 million+ contributors from diverse backgrounds who help our customers collect, enhance, train, translate, and localize content to build better AI models. Become part of our growing community and make an impact supporting the machine learning models of some of the world’s largest brands.







Qualification Path




No previous professional experience is required to apply to this role, however, working on this project will require you to pass the basic requirements and go through a standard assessment process. This is a part-time long-term project and your work will be subject to our standard quality assurance checks during the term of this agreement.




Basic Requirements

Full Professional Proficiency in English & German language
Being a resident in Switzerland for the last 2 consecutive years and having familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media, and cultural affairs in Switzerland
Ability to follow guidelines and conduct online research using search engines, online maps, and website information
Flexibility to work across a diverse set of task types, including maps, news, audio tasks, and relevance
Daily access to a broadband internet connection, computer, and relevant software




Assessment

In order to be hired into the program, you’ll take an open book qualification exam that will determine your suitability for the position and complete ID verification. Our team will provide you with guidelines and learning materials before your qualification exam. You will be required to complete the exam in a specific timeframe but at your convenience.




Equal Opportunity

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for a contractual relationship without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. At TELUS Digital AI, we are proud to offer equal opportunities and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive community. All aspects of selection are based on applicants’ qualifications, merits, competence, and performance without regard to any characteristic related to diversity.

Title: Database Administrator - Cloud migration
Description:
We are looking for a




DBA Consultant - Cloud Migration for our Zurich based client in the Banking sector.




Your tasks:

• Automate the deployment of database modules using modern infrastructure-as-code tools

• Work collaboratively with DevOps and infrastructure teams to ensure smooth deployment pipelines

• Participate in the transition to a scalable cloud-based environment

• Apply best practices in scripting and automation for enterprise database solutions




Your experience/knowledge:

• Strong experience with Oracle databases

• Proficiency in Ansible and Terraform

• Hands-on knowledge of Git for version control

• Solid understanding of deployment automation and DevOps methodologies




Your soft skills:

• Excellent comprehension skills with attention to detail

• A high degree of self-organisation and time management

• Analytical and solution-orientated thinking.

Title: AI & Software Internship
Description:
At Neurosoft Bioelectronics, we are building implantable brain-computer interfaces (iBCIs) aimed at addressing severe neurological conditions, leveraging novel materials designed to enhance long-term functionality within the human body. Despite advancements in our understanding of neuronal activity, decoding brain signals in a clear and reliable way remains a complex challenge.




We have gathered specific datasets of brain activity recorded from animal models, and more recently, from human subjects using our iBCIs. To advance our research, we are investigating how advanced artificial intelligence (AI) techniques, including foundation models across various modalities, can be used to improve decoding of these neuronal signals.




We are looking to test various strategies using AI foundation models to decode brain activity. This project will span over a minimum of 6 months and will involve the following steps:





Data and meta-data curation, preparation, and formatting to match models’ inputs — this will be done in-house at Neurosoft Bioelectronics based at Campus Biotech, in Geneva, Switzerland (months 1–2)


Development and tuning of a large-scale neuronal decoding model that can effectively combine brain datasets from different sources — in collaboration with an external partner institution (months 2–6)


Model testing, fine-tuning, and decoding of brain data (months 5–6)



Tasks


We are looking for a motivated individual currently enrolled in a MSc study program at EPFL (or at an equivalent institution) willing to carry out a full-time 6-month unpaid internship at Neurosoft Bioelectronics. The project could then be extended depending on available funding.


Requirements


Education and experience: Ongoing MSc studies (preferably prior to MSc thesis) in one of the Neuro-X laboratories or within another closely related EPFL laboratory.




Specific skills:





Strong experience with AI models (e.g., adaptive transformers) and/or currently attending specific advanced machine learning courses


Background in basic human neuroscience and/or willingness to learn about auditory neuroscience


Ease & experience with code or data handling tools (e.g., python, MATLAB, …)


Ease & experience with machine learning and deep learning models and tools (e.g., transformer architecture, deep learning models, CNNs, …)


Willingness to collaborate with students and supervisors from partner institution outside of EPFL


Good communication skills and language level (at least C1) in English, French is a plus


Willingness to contribute to a fast-paced start-up environment



Benefits


The full-time 6-month internship will start in mid-September 2025, according to the semester's calendar.




Please include the following elements in your application compiled as a single PDF file:





Curriculum vitae (with academic transcripts/grades and attended courses)


A short motivation statement (max. one page), incl. a description of your career goals


The phone and/or email contact of at least two references.





Ready to contribute to groundbreaking medical device projects? If you believe you have the skills and enthusiasm we’re looking for, please apply. Qualified candidates will be contacted to arrange an introductory online interview. Join us on our journey to advance neurotechnology!

Show more

Title: Data Specialist – CDO Global Black Belt
Description:
Microsoft’s Commercial Solution Area (CSA) sets the sales strategy, leads technical sales, and operations as a hub for the Commercial Solution Areas and Support Services that power the Microsoft Cloud. Data & Analytics is a growth opportunity for Microsoft Azure, as well as its partners and customers. It includes a rich portfolio of products providing unified Data Platform supporting customers’ Data needs in the era and AI.

The Azure Global Black Belt (GBB) Cloud & AI Data Specialist is a pivotal role in building trust with the Chief Data Officers (CDOs) of our customers, guiding them to build the Data Foundations for their companies’ AI Transformation and influencing them to standardize on the Microsoft Intelligent Data platform. This role is crucial for driving the adoption of Azure Data & AI Services, with a particular focus on the MACC (Microsoft Azure Consumption Commitment) accounts.

The role engages with CDOs of our largest accounts and accounts in complex competitive situations, documenting best practices and learnings. The role also involves guiding the broader field on the winning formulas for successful CDO engagements.

Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.

Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities:

Accelerate Data & AI growth while influencing Product Excellence and Go-To-Market with the insights and experiences from these engagements.


Strategic Relationships: Establish trusted advisor relationships with senior business and technology executives (CDO, CIO, CISO, CTO) in top accounts by consistently delivering value through Azure-led innovation, while amplifying Microsoft’s thought leadership by actively shaping and participating in CDO community forums, executive panels, and strategic storytelling platforms.
Drive Data & AI Platform Standardization: Influence CDOs to standardize on the Microsoft Data & AI platforms end-to-end, across their Analytics platform, Data Governance, and Databases to support their companies’ AI transformation.
Accelerate Azure Data Services Growth: Drive the increase of Azure Data Services share in key accounts, with a focus on MACC accounts. Key outcome: Increase ADS (Azure Data Services) share of ACR (Azure Consumed Revenue) in MACC agreements / MACC accounts, win new MACCs (Microsoft Azure Consumption Commitments).
Remove blockers and accelerate sales: Identify and resolve roadblocks that may hinder customer progress, bring values into deal strategy to assist sellers with deep expertise in top partner offerings globally, capacity and pricing/SKU/model, use case scenarios, process, business value articulation for assigned specialization area.
Win Over Competitors & Business Commitment: Expert in compete coaching against major Public Cloud Hyper Scalers competitors by defining winning competitive strategies (win back, surround), demonstrating superior solutions and securing business commitment.
Incubation to Mainstream: Spot repeatable patterns in sales motions (e.g., commercial constructs, customer scenarios) and scale them across the field.
Sales Strategy Feedback Loop: Working with Go-To-Market team to capture insights from customer engagements and field feedback to identify sales patterns, blockers, and opportunities. Share these insights with MCAPS to help shape better sales strategies that continuously meet customer needs and field realities.
Knowledge Transfer to Sales Roles: Work with enablement team as a scale mechanism to skill specialist, specialist managers, and sales leaders through deal coaching, structured knowledge sharing, and training.
Thought Leadership: Be a leading industry expert and drive awareness and adoption through speaking at events, publishing articles, and sharing best practices.


Key Outcomes


Increase ADS share of ACR in MACC agreements / MACC accounts.
Enhanced consistency and effectiveness in CDO engagements across the timezone.
Documented best practices and winning formulas for CDO engagements.
Successful execution of Data & AI solution plays, driving business growth and customer success.


Qualifications

Required/Minimum Qualifications (RQs/MQs):


Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration,
OR related field AND growing experience in technology-related sales or account management;
OR highly experienced in technology-related sales or account management
Significant experience leading the sales of large cloud engagements, especially those involving Data, Analytics and AI solutions to large/global enterprise customers.

Additional Or Preferred Qualifications (PQs)


Sales Account Planning and Management: Strong and disciplined pipeline management, identification and analysis of customer usage trends, large dollar licensing and deal negotiation experience, understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs.
Executive Presence: Experience and expertise selling to senior business decision makers by aligning & reinforcing the business value and cost savings of the solution to the customer’s overall business pain and/or strategic opportunities and decision criteria.
Collaborative: Orchestrate and influence virtual sales/technical/support/partner teams to pursue sales opportunities and lead virtual teams through influence.
Consumption Business Strategy / Project Management: Experience leveraging cloud adoption methodologies and frameworks to structure application migration projects.
Deep understanding of the Microsoft Data platform and Azure Data and AI Services.
Competitive Landscape: Knowledge of enterprise software solutions and cloud & AI competitor landscape including AWS and GCP.
Microsoft Partners: Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs.

For Austria Only: The salary for this role is starting from EURO 182,600 per annum depending on experience.

Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

  • Incubation to Mainstream: Spot repeatable patterns in sales motions (e.g., commercial constructs, customer scenarios) and scale them across the field.
  • Sales Strategy Feedback Loop: Working with Go-To-Market team to capture insights from customer engagements and field feedback to identify sales patterns, blockers, and opportunities. Share these insights with MCAPS to help shape better sales strategies that continuously meet customer needs and field realities.
  • Knowledge Transfer to Sales Roles: Work with enablement team as a scale mechanism to skill specialist, specialist managers, and sales leaders through deal coaching, structured knowledge sharing, and training.
  • Thought Leadership: Be a leading industry expert and drive awareness and adoption through speaking at events, publishing articles, and sharing best practices.

Key Outcomes

  • Increase ADS share of ACR in MACC agreements / MACC accounts.
  • Enhanced consistency and effectiveness in CDO engagements across the timezone.
  • Documented best practices and winning formulas for CDO engagements.
  • Successful execution of Data & AI solution plays, driving business growth and customer success.

Qualifications

Required/Minimum Qualifications (RQs/MQs):

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration,
    • OR related field AND growing experience in technology-related sales or account management;
    • OR highly experienced in technology-related sales or account management
  • Significant experience leading the sales of large cloud engagements, especially those involving Data, Analytics and AI solutions to large/global enterprise customers.
Additional Or Preferred Qualifications (PQs)

  • Sales Account Planning and Management: Strong and disciplined pipeline management, identification and analysis of customer usage trends, large dollar licensing and deal negotiation experience, understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs.
    • Executive Presence: Experience and expertise selling to senior business decision makers by aligning & reinforcing the business value and cost savings of the solution to the customer’s overall business pain and/or strategic opportunities and decision criteria.
    • Collaborative: Orchestrate and influence virtual sales/technical/support/partner teams to pursue sales opportunities and lead virtual teams through influence.
  • Consumption Business Strategy / Project Management: Experience leveraging cloud adoption methodologies and frameworks to structure application migration projects.
  • Deep understanding of the Microsoft Data platform and Azure Data and AI Services.
    • Competitive Landscape: Knowledge of enterprise software solutions and cloud & AI competitor landscape including AWS and GCP.
    • Microsoft Partners: Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs.
For Austria Only: The salary for this role is starting from EURO 182,600 per annum depending on experience.

Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

Title: Online Data Analyst
Description:
Are you a detail-oriented individual with a passion for research and a good understanding of national and local geography? This freelance opportunity allows you to work at your own pace and from the comfort of your own home.

A Day in the Life of an Online Data Analyst:

In this role, you will be working on a project aimed at enhancing the content and quality of digital maps that are used by millions of people worldwide
Completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment such as verifying and comparing data, and determining the relevance and accuracy of information.

Join us today and be part of a dynamic and innovative team that is making a difference in the world!

TELUS Digital AI Community

Our global AI Community is a vibrant network of 1 million+ contributors from diverse backgrounds who help our customers collect, enhance, train, translate, and localize content to build better AI models. Become part of our growing community and make an impact supporting the machine learning models of some of the world’s largest brands.







Qualification Path




No previous professional experience is required to apply to this role, however, working on this project will require you to pass the basic requirements and go through a standard assessment process. This is a part-time long-term project and your work will be subject to our standard quality assurance checks during the term of this agreement.




Basic Requirements

Full Professional Proficiency in English & German language
Being a resident in Switzerland for the last 2 consecutive years and having familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media, and cultural affairs in Switzerland
Ability to follow guidelines and conduct online research using search engines, online maps, and website information
Flexibility to work across a diverse set of task types, including maps, news, audio tasks, and relevance
Daily access to a broadband internet connection, computer, and relevant software




Assessment

In order to be hired into the program, you’ll take an open book qualification exam that will determine your suitability for the position and complete ID verification. Our team will provide you with guidelines and learning materials before your qualification exam. You will be required to complete the exam in a specific timeframe but at your convenience.




Equal Opportunity

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for a contractual relationship without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. At TELUS Digital AI, we are proud to offer equal opportunities and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive community. All aspects of selection are based on applicants’ qualifications, merits, competence, and performance without regard to any characteristic related to diversity.

Title: Analista de Prevenção a Fraudes- Dados | Adquirência
Description:
Sobre o PicPay

Com mais de dez anos de história, o PicPay é um ecossistema completo de serviços financeiros e não-financeiros que tem como objetivo atender as necessidades diárias de milhares de pessoas e negócios, tornando-se a sua principal conta do dia a dia.

Fundada em Vitória (ES), a empresa já conta com mais de 35 milhões de clientes ativos e faz parte do grupo J&F, um dos maiores conglomerados empresariais do Brasil. A companhia atua em diversas frentes, como Serviços Financeiros para Pessoa Física, Serviços Financeiros para Pessoa Jurídica, Investimentos e PicPay Shop.

Pautados pela nossa cultura, seguimos no propósito de dar muito mais pique para a vida de milhões de brasileiros. Conheça nossos valores: Atitude de Dono(a), Disciplina, Determinação, Disponibilidade, Simplicidade, Humildade e Franqueza.

O respeito, a ética, a busca pela equidade e a valorização da pluralidade são elementos inegociáveis e fazem parte da prática no nosso dia a dia aqui no PicPay. Por isso, esta vaga está aberta para todas as pessoas, independente de gênero, religião, etnia, deficiência, idade, orientação sexual ou qualquer outro fator.

Sobre a vaga:

Estamos em busca de um(a) Analista de Prevenção a Fraudes, com perfil altamente técnico, pensamento analítico e visão orientada a resultados, para integrar a área de Estratégia de Prevenção a Fraudes PJ, com foco em produtos de adquirência.Você terá papel central na manipulação, estruturação e disponibilização de dados que apoiem decisões estratégicas de prevenção e detecção de fraudes, garantindo a qualidade e a confiabilidade das informações que alimentam modelos, regras e monitoramentos.Sua atuação será fundamental para conectar inteligência de dados com a execução de ações preventivas e reativas, equilibrando segurança, compliance e eficiência operacional.Responsabilidades e atribuições

Responsabilidade e atribuições:


Extrair, transformar e consolidar grandes volumes de dados de diferentes fontes, assegurando qualidade, rastreabilidade e performance.
Desenvolver e manter pipelines de dados escaláveis e eficientes (ETL/ELT) para alimentar análises, modelos e motores de decisão antifraude.
Criar e evoluir dashboards e indicadores estratégicos, como taxa de detecção, falsos positivos, perdas evitadas e exposição por segmento/MCC/fluxo.
Estruturar análises para identificar padrões, recorrência de fraudes, comportamentos atípicos em transações e perfis de clientes PJ.
Apoiar a calibração e o monitoramento de regras do motor de decisão (fraude, score, bloqueios, análises manuais) com base em evidências e dados históricos.
Garantir a integridade e a consistência dos dados utilizados pelos times de prevenção, produto, engenharia e compliance.
Contribuir para a automação de relatórios e a padronização de métricas, acelerando a geração de insights.
Realizar benchmarks de indicadores e práticas de mercado, propondo melhorias nos processos de monitoramento.


Requisitos e qualificações


Experiência sólida com SQL e pelo menos uma linguagem de programação voltada a manipulação de dados (Python, R ou equivalente).
Vivência na construção, manutenção e otimização de pipelines de dados.
Experiência com ferramentas de visualização e BI (Power BI, Tableau, Looker ou similares).
Conhecimento de modelagem de dados e boas práticas de ETL/ELT.
Experiência prévia em prevenção à fraude, preferencialmente em meios de aceitação (cartões, adquirência, pagamentos digitais).
Capacidade analítica e atenção a detalhes para detectar padrões, anomalias e tendências.


Diferenciais


Conhecimento em análise de risco e regras antifraude.
Experiência com grandes volumes de dados em ambientes distribuídos (Databricks, Spark, Hadoop, etc.).
Noções de machine learning aplicado à detecção de fraudes.
Vivência com integrações de APIs e automação de processos de dados.
Familiaridade com regulamentações Bacen, bandeiras e PLD/FT.
Experiência com produtos de adquirência como POS, Link de Pagamento, QR Code, Tap on Phone, entre outros.


O que oferecemos:

Saúde e Bem-estar


Assistência Médica e Odontológica;
Seguro de Vida;
Programa Lado a Lado, com apoio jurídico, social, psicológico e financeiro;
Wellhub.


Alimentação/ Mobilidade ou Teletrabalho:


Cartão de crédito PicPay Benefícios, com ampla aceitação, onde você recebe seu saldo de Alimentação/Refeição e Mobilidade ou Teletrabalho (de acordo com o seu contrato de trabalho).


Licença Paternidade e Maternidade:


Licença Maternidade estendida de 6 meses, e de Paternidade também estendida de 20 dias.
Programa "Novo Ser", que acompanha nossas mamães durante toda a gestação e no retorno da licença. Falando nisso, ao retornar da licença maternidade, as mamães ainda contam com a ajuda do Auxílio Creche e também os papais que possuem guarda unilateral ou compartilhada.


Reconhecemos resultados: PPR- Participação nos Resultados do PicPay.

#VemserPicpayLover #Picpay

  • Conhecimento de modelagem de dados e boas práticas de ETL/ELT.

  • Cartão de crédito PicPay Benefícios, com ampla aceitação, onde você recebe seu saldo de Alimentação/Refeição e Mobilidade ou Teletrabalho (de acordo com o seu contrato de trabalho).

Title: Estágio | Data Science
HTML:
A área de Ciência de Dados está inserida na estrutura de CRM tendo como objetivo fornecer análises descritivas e modelos estatísticos para apoiar as ações de PF, PJ e Financeira.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

  • Auxiliar na manutenção e atualização das bases de dados utilizadas pela área;
  • Auxiliar na atualização e monitoramento dos modelos preditivos aplicados em campanhas de CRM;
  • Auxiliar nos modelos voltados à rentabilização, prospecção e retenção de clientes dos segmentos Pessoa Física (PF), Pessoa Jurídica (PJ) e Financeira.


Requisitos e qualificações

  • Cursando graduando em Estatística, Engenharias, Economia, Matemática, Física, Ciência da Computação e/ou áreas correlatas;
  • Excel/Power Point (básico);
  • Conhecimento em SQL (básico);
  • Conhecimento em Excel (básico).


Informações adicionais

  • Trilhas de capacitação acadêmica e técnica;
  • Oportunidade de encarreiramento;
  • Vale Refeição;
  • Convênio médico e odontológico
  • J. Safra Clube (descontos em farmácias, lazer, bem estar e saúde, educação, colônia de férias no litoral Sul de São Paulo).


Todas as nossas vagas estão abertas para Pessoas com Deficiência (PCDs). Caso você se enquadre ou conheça alguém com o perfil, junte-se a nós!

Title: Analista de Dados - foco em Finanças
Description:
About The Team

Sobre a Shô

Aqui na Shô, acreditamos que cada membro de nossa equipe é fundamental para o nosso sucesso, e que diversidade de perspectivas e vivências são essenciais para movimentar nosso negócio e impulsionar o nosso propósito de mudar o mundo para melhor. Fazer parte do nosso time é a oportunidade de se desenvolver dentro de uma cultura de muita agilidade. Se você ama assumir grandes responsabilidades e fazer o que nunca foi feito, a Shô é seu lugar. Aqui você terá grandes desafios, trabalhará em colaboração com um time diverso e contribuirá para o futuro do e-commerce no Brasil, criamos impacto positivo na vida de milhões de pessoas.

Modelo de Trabalho

Adotamos um modelo de trabalho híbrido, esse modelo permite que as pessoas ajustem seu ambiente de trabalho de acordo com suas necessidades pessoais, ao mesmo tempo em que promove a colaboração e interação no escritório.

Qual será a sua missão

Você será parte do time de Finanças, integrando uma área focada em dados, responsável por fornecer relatórios, análises e insights para as outras equipes e também para a liderança. Esse time é fundamental para apoiar as tomadas de decisão de área.

Job Description

Como será o seu dia a dia


Inserir dados usando Python
Reconciliar e resumir dados usando SQL
Criar relatórios financeiros usando Excel, PowerPoint e Looker Studio
Fornecer insights e recomendações com base na análise de dados
Automatizar rotinas financeiras repetitivas
Documentar procedimentos, metodologias e descobertas para referência e relatórios futuros
Colaborar com outras equipes analisando dados, monitorando KPIs, criando relatórios e atuando como ponte entre as partes interessadas técnicas e não técnicas.


Requirements

O que você precisa para assumir o desafio


Graduação em área relacionada a tecnologia ou finanças.
Nível avançado de SQL e Microsoft Office.
Conhecimento de Python e Looker Studio.
Experiência com análise de dados.
Experiência anterior em finanças.
Inglês avançado (será testado durante o processo).


Benefícios


Assistência médica e odontológica, estendendo-se aos dependentes;
Parceira com Wellhub (Gympass) e TotalPass;
Vale Refeição/Alimentação flexível;
Vale Transporte ou, Vale Mobilidade;
Benefício flexível;
Parceria com o app Zenklub;
Bônus anual discricionário, atrelado à performance.


VEM FAZER HISTÓRIA COM A GENTE.

O QUE TE FAZ ÚNICO, NOS FAZ MELHORES!
Show more

Title: Junior Data Analytics
Description:
Sobre nós 

A XP Inc. é uma das maiores instituições financeiras independente do Brasil, dona das marcas XP, Rico, Clear, XP Educação, InfoMoney, entre outras. Com mais de 4,6 milhões de clientes ativos e um valor superior a R$ 1,1 trilhão de ativos sob custódia, há 24 anos vem transformando o mercado financeiro para melhorar a vida das pessoas.

Com uma cultura marcante guiada por quatro valores - Sonho Grande, Espírito Empreendedor, Foco no Cliente e Mente Aberta - a XP Inc. está sempre em busca dos melhores talentos que tem ambição de fazer o impossível.

>> Sobre a vaga:

Essa oportunidade é para a área de Dados e Analytics em Prevenção a Fraudes e Atendimento, que tem a missão de criar do começo ao fim, produtos de dados que gerem valor e suportem decisões de negócio. Esse é um time apaixonado por dados, você pode se dar muito bem se gostar de Modelagem e Engenharia de Dados, Data Viz, SQL e Python.

>> Principais responsabilidades:


Modelagem e Engenharia de Dados para criação de DAGs de ETL, utilizando SQL e Python dentro da plataforma Databricks;
Criação de Dashboards utilizando o Power BI;
Estudos para embasar decisões de negócio;
Interação com Stakeholders.


>> Para esta vaga, é essencial:


Conhecimento avançado em SQL;
Experiência com modelagem de dados e construção de pipelines de ETL;
Conhecimento em ferramentas de Data Viz;
Raciocínio lógico e perfil analítico;
Residir em São Paulo


>> Você pode ter destaque se:


Tiver conhecimento em Python e PySpark;
Tiver experiência com Databricks;
Tiver conhecimento em Power BI e DAX;
Experiência com uso de IA generativa.


“Se te oferecem um lugar em um foguete, não pergunte qual é o assento, apenas embarque.”

Sheryl Sandberg

Benefícios:  

Saúde e Bem-estar


Plano de saúde sem coparticipação (inclusive, para dependentes)
Plano odontológico
Wellhub (Gympass)
Zenklub
Seguro de Vida
iFood Benefícios (VA e VR flexível)
Vale Transporte
New Value (clube de benefícios)
Licença parental: maternidade de 6 meses e paternidade de 20 dias.
Auxílio Creche


Vida Financeira


Fundos de Investimentos Exclusivos
Assessoria de Investimentos
Cartão XP Visa Infinite sem anuidade
Crédito (consignado, home equity, CCB Imobiliário, etc.)


Modelo de Trabalho Presencial Flexível

O nosso modelo de trabalho varia de acordo com a função, podendo ser totalmente presencial para frentes de negócio e mais flexível para outras equipes.

Seguimos um modelo com mais frequência presencial, mas sempre guiado por flexibilidade e autonomia com a responsabilidade da nossa cultura empreendedora.

Aqui na XP Inc., valorizamos as interações pessoais e acreditamos no uso do escritório como uma ferramenta para potencializar nossas relações no trabalho.
Show more
HTML:
Sobre nós 

A XP Inc. é uma das maiores instituições financeiras independente do Brasil, dona das marcas XP, Rico, Clear, XP Educação, InfoMoney, entre outras. Com mais de 4,6 milhões de clientes ativos e um valor superior a R$ 1,1 trilhão de ativos sob custódia, há 24 anos vem transformando o mercado financeiro para melhorar a vida das pessoas.

Com uma cultura marcante guiada por quatro valores - Sonho Grande, Espírito Empreendedor, Foco no Cliente e Mente Aberta - a XP Inc. está sempre em busca dos melhores talentos que tem ambição de fazer o impossível.

>> Sobre a vaga:

Essa oportunidade é para a área de Dados e Analytics em Prevenção a Fraudes e Atendimento, que tem a missão de criar do começo ao fim, produtos de dados que gerem valor e suportem decisões de negócio. Esse é um time apaixonado por dados, você pode se dar muito bem se gostar de Modelagem e Engenharia de Dados, Data Viz, SQL e Python.

>> Principais responsabilidades:

  • Modelagem e Engenharia de Dados para criação de DAGs de ETL, utilizando SQL e Python dentro da plataforma Databricks;
  • Criação de Dashboards utilizando o Power BI;
  • Estudos para embasar decisões de negócio;
  • Interação com Stakeholders.

>> Para esta vaga, é essencial:

  • Conhecimento avançado em SQL;
  • Experiência com modelagem de dados e construção de pipelines de ETL;
  • Conhecimento em ferramentas de Data Viz;
  • Raciocínio lógico e perfil analítico;
  • Residir em São Paulo

>> Você pode ter destaque se:

  • Tiver conhecimento em Python e PySpark;
  • Tiver experiência com Databricks;
  • Tiver conhecimento em Power BI e DAX;
  • Experiência com uso de IA generativa.

“Se te oferecem um lugar em um foguete, não pergunte qual é o assento, apenas embarque.”

Sheryl Sandberg

Benefícios:  

Saúde e Bem-estar

  • Plano de saúde sem coparticipação (inclusive, para dependentes)
  • Plano odontológico
  • Wellhub (Gympass)
  • Zenklub
  • Seguro de Vida
  • iFood Benefícios (VA e VR flexível)
  • Vale Transporte
  • New Value (clube de benefícios)
  • Licença parental: maternidade de 6 meses e paternidade de 20 dias.
  • Auxílio Creche

Vida Financeira

  • Fundos de Investimentos Exclusivos
  • Assessoria de Investimentos
  • Cartão XP Visa Infinite sem anuidade
  • Crédito (consignado, home equity, CCB Imobiliário, etc.)

Modelo de Trabalho Presencial Flexível

O nosso modelo de trabalho varia de acordo com a função, podendo ser totalmente presencial para frentes de negócio e mais flexível para outras equipes.

Seguimos um modelo com mais frequência presencial, mas sempre guiado por flexibilidade e autonomia com a responsabilidade da nossa cultura empreendedora.

Aqui na XP Inc., valorizamos as interações pessoais e acreditamos no uso do escritório como uma ferramenta para potencializar nossas relações no trabalho.

Title: Analista de Dados | Dados
HTML:
Sobre a Área

A área de dados do Banco tem crescido rapidamente e é protagonista nos novos modelos de negócio. Prezamos por um time de alta qualidade e valorizamos profissionais com perfil multidisciplinar, forte capacidade analítica, curiosidade intelectual e disposição para trabalho duro, sempre buscando resolver desafios complexos com excelência. Temos oportunidades para atuar junto a diversas áreas do banco, como Banking, Investimentos, Crédito, Asset Management e Plataformas Digitais. Buscamos profissionais motivados, capazes de trabalhar de forma autônoma, que gostem de desafios, sejam naturalmente curiosos e desejem atuar em um ambiente dinâmico, com forte impacto no negócio.

No Seu Dia a Dia

  • Realizar estudos e análises avançadas utilizando técnicas e ferramentas de Big Data;
  • Manter e otimizar ETLs garantindo a integridade e disponibilidade dos dados;
  • Desenvolver dashboards claros e intuitivos, facilitando a tomada de decisões estratégicas.

Esperamos De Você

  • Graduação completa em Engenharia, Computação, Matemática ou áreas correlatas;
  • Disponibilidade para atuar no modelo presencial (5x por semana) no escritório de São Paulo (Faria Lima);;
  • Experiência sólida em Python e SQL;
  • Conhecimento em soluções e serviços AWS;
  • Domínio de ferramentas de visualização de dados, especialmente PowerBI;
  • Excelentes habilidades analíticas, capacidade de resolução de problemas e curiosidade intelectual;
  • Inglês avançado é um diferencial;
  • Conhecimento prévio do mercado financeiro (investimentos, crédito, banking, etc.) ou plataformas digitais é um diferencial;
  • Conhecimento e experiência prática em inferência estatística é um diferencial.

Benefícios

  • Participação nos Lucros e Resultados (PLR);
  • Bonus por performance;
  • Auxílio Alimentação e Refeição;
  • Plano Médico;
  • Plano Odontológico;
  • Auxílio Creche/Babá;
  • Vale Transporte;
  • WellHub;
  • TotalPass;
  • Programa de Apoio Pessoal (EAP);
  • Planos por adesão como Previdência Privada e Seguro de Vida;
  • Desconto em Farmácia;
  • Programa de Nutrição;
  • Programa de Gestantes;
  • Licença Maternidade e Paternidade Estendida – empresa Cidadã.

Title: Analista de Dados - Fresh Grads
HTML:
Job Description

Sobre a Shô

Aqui na Shô, acreditamos que cada membro de nossa equipe é fundamental para o nosso sucesso, e que diversidade de perspectivas e vivências são essenciais para movimentar nosso negócio e impulsionar o nosso propósito de mudar o mundo para melhor.

Fazer parte do nosso time é a oportunidade de se desenvolver dentro de uma cultura de muita agilidade. Se você ama assumir grandes responsabilidades e fazer o que nunca foi feito, a Shô é seu lugar. Aqui você terá grandes desafios, trabalhará em colaboração com um time diverso e contribuirá para o futuro do e-commerce no Brasil, criamos impacto positivo na vida de milhões de pessoas.

Modelo de Trabalho

Adotamos um modelo de trabalho híbrido, esse modelo permite que as pessoas ajustem seu ambiente de trabalho de acordo com suas necessidades pessoais, ao mesmo tempo em que promove a colaboração e interação no escritório.

Qual será a sua missão

O Analista de Dados pleno é responsável por executar tanto tarefas operacionais quanto estratégicas. Além de entregar tarefas simples de forma rápida e confiável, ao mesmo tempo em que participa de análises de dados estratégicas e decisões de negócios, utilizando habilidades técnicas, habilidades interpessoais e conhecimento de negócios para influenciar a direção das áreas.

Como será o seu dia a dia

  • Criar KPIs e visualizações para cada um;
  • Automatizar relatórios e painéis para tomada de decisão rápida;
  • Propor novos KPIs e dashboards;
  • Revisar dashboards constantemente;
  • Organizar encontros para compartilhar insights de dados com as áreas de negócio;
  • Compartilhar conhecimento com os colegas de negócio sobre ferramentas e novos insights;
  • Identificar stakeholders para qualquer iniciativa de dados (para mapear KPIs, iniciativas de outras áreas que possamos utilizar e compartilhar conhecimento);
  • Trabalhar próximo de outros times, identificando novas oportunidades de melhoria nos processos internos;
  • Sugerir novas funcionalidades para o negócio;
  • Desenvolver automações para aumentar a eficiência operacional.

Requirements

O que você precisa para assumir o desafio

  • Graduação em cursos de tecnologia, dados, matemática ou áreas correlatas;
  • Conhecimento intermediário em SQL e Python;
  • Inglês avançado.

Benefícios

  • Assistência médica e odontológica, estendendo-se aos dependentes;
  • Parceria com Wellhub e TotalPass;
  • Vale Refeição/Alimentação flexível;
  • Vale Transporte, Vale Mobilidade ou Estacionamento no local;
  • Benefício flexível;
  • Zenklub;
  • Bônus anual discricionário, atrelado à performance.

VEM FAZER HISTÓRIA COM A GENTE.

O QUE TE FAZ ÚNICO, NOS FAZ MELHORES! 🧡

Title: Analista de Ciências de dados Pleno
HTML:
Somos mais que uma máquina, somos pessoas que transformam e criam infinitas possibilidades.

Trabalhamos para simplificar e impulsionar negócios para todas as pessoas, oferecendo soluções financeiras inteligentes. Aqui, investimos em tecnologia, promovemos desenvolvimento e fomentamos a inovação para criar novos caminhos possíveis e gerar impacto positivo no mundo.

Na Cielo, a gente trabalha com autonomia para escrever nossa própria jornada, liberdade para ser quem a gente é, e a oportunidade de fazer acontecer. Somos um time que sonha no plural, oferecendo uma experiência completa e focando no bem-estar físico e mental de nossos mais de 7.000 colaboradores e suas famílias.

Acreditamos na inclusão e acolhimento de todas as pessoas, com suas singularidades e diversidade de vivências.

Conheça mais sobre a área:

Responsável por apoiar a construção e manutenção dos modelos de propensão de produto e perfis de clusters correlatos, visando garantir o direcionamento correto dos produtos de prazo para o cliente e otimização de conversão da força comercial, baseando-se nas principais técnicas de modelagem analítica e estatística avançadas, assegurando rentabilidade para a companhia.

Bora realizar seus sonhos com a gente!

Juntos com você, em infinitas possibilidades.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Tem lugar para você nesse propósito:

  • Apoiar análises do time de modelagem por meio de desenho de construção e features para a área de Produtos de Prazo Varejo;
  • Mapear necessidades das áreas de negócios, avaliar necessidades de dados, construir códigos analíticos e acompanhar a implementação das análises;
  • Auxiliar o desenvolvimento e implementação de modelos preditivos e analíticos utilizando técnicas;
  • Avançadas de machine learning e estatística, identificando padrões, tendências e oportunidades de otimização;
  • Colaborar com equipes multidisciplinares para traduzir problemas de negócios em soluções de modelagem de dados;
  • Interpretar os resultados dos modelos e comunicar insights de forma clara para partes interessadas internas e externas.

Requisitos e qualificações

O que o #TimeCielo espera de você?

  • Superior Completo: Ciência da Computação, Estatística, Engenharia ou áreas relacionadas;
  • Conhecimento avançado de linguagens de programação (SQL, SAS, Python e/ou R), Excel e Powerpoint;
  • Experiência trabalhando com métodos analíticos avançados (exemplo: deep learning e otimização);
  • Boas noções de Power BI (ou outras ferramentas de automatização de dashboards);
  • Experiência na criação e gestão de KPIs financeiros e operacionais do negócio;
  • Capacidade de comunicar resultados complexos de análises de forma clara e concisa;
  • Ser orientado a resultado, buscando sempre a melhoria dos processos existentes.

Informações adicionais

Por que viver infinitas possibilidades ao nosso lado?

  • Assistência Médica e Odontológica;
  • Remuneração Variável Anual (PPR);
  • Auxílio Refeição e Alimentação;
  • Fretado/vale-transporte ou estacionamento;
  • Modelo Híbrido;
  • Auxílio Trabalho Remoto;
  • Seguro de Vida;
  • Seguro residencial e automóvel;
  • Assistência funeral familiar;
  • Previdência Privada;
  • Canal de apoio à especialistas (nutrição, psicologia, ginecologia, etc);
  • Campanha de Vacinação;
  • Acesso à diversos cursos em nossa plataforma Educa;
  • Wellhub;
  • Programa de Gestação Saudável;
  • Licença Maternidade e Paternidade estendida;
  • Auxílio Creche;
  • Day Off de Aniversário;
  • Dress Code Flexível;
  • Horário Flexível;
  • Sexta curta;
  • Almoço estendido (1h30).

Benefícios

  • Assistência médica e odontológica, estendendo-se aos dependentes;

Title: Internship, Data Insights (Central Operations)
Description:
Company Description

LinkedIn is the world’s largest professional network, built to create economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce. Our products help people make powerful connections, discover exciting opportunities, build necessary skills, and gain valuable insights every day. We’re also committed to providing transformational opportunities for our own employees by investing in their growth. We aspire to create a culture that’s built on trust, care, inclusion, and fun – where everyone can succeed.

Join us to transform the way the world works.

Job Description

This role will be based in São Paulo.

At LinkedIn, our approach to flexible work is centered on trust and optimized for culture, connection, clarity, and the evolving needs of our business. The work location of this role is hybrid, meaning it will be performed both from home and from a LinkedIn office on select days, as determined by the business needs of the team.

Please submit your application in English.

As a Data Insights Intern in Central Operations, you’ll apply what you’re learning in the classroom to real operational problems. You’ll help build and maintain analytics assets, improve data quality and governance, and create lightweight automations that make our workflows faster and more reliable. You’ll own portions of work end-to-end, collaborate across teams, and present your findings to stakeholders.

What you’ll do:


Reporting & dashboards: support the creation, iteration, and delivery of recurring reports and dashboards that guide operational decisions.
Data quality & governance: assist with data cleaning, documentation, and compliance activities to ensure high quality, trustworthy datasets.
Workflow automation: contribute to small automations that reduce manual steps, improve SLAs, and standardize processes.
Business analysis: run ad hoc analyses to answer well scoped questions, quantify impact, and surface actionable insights for partners.
Risk & compliance support: help investigate issues by compiling data, performing checks, and summarizing findings as needed.
Communication: share progress and recommendations in team meetings and leadership forums; incorporate feedback and iterate quickly.



What you’ll learn


How to turn raw data into stakeholder ready insights using BI tools.
How to design lightweight automations that remove toil and drive consistency.
How data governance practices keep analytics environments compliant and reliable.
How to communicate technical findings clearly and persuasively to nontechnical audiences.



Qualifications

Basic Qualifications:


Enrolled and pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Business, Engineering, Math or similar courses.
Business fluency in English
Experience with Data Analysis, including advanced Excel skills and SQL skills
Available for at least 12 months of Internship



Preferred Qualifications


Experience with Power BI or Tableau for building dashboards.
Python for data wrangling/automation (e.g., pandas) is a plus.
Familiarity with issue tracking tools (e.g., Jira) and interest in process optimization.
Exposure to data catalogs/governance concepts (e.g., documentation, data quality checks).
Structured problem solving, attention to detail, and a bias for ownership on end-to-end tasks.



Suggested Skills:


Cross Function Collaboration
Problem Solving
Data Analytics 



Additional Information

Global Data Privacy Notice for Job Candidates

Please follow this link to access the document that provides transparency around the way in which LinkedIn handles personal data of employees and job applicants: https://legal.linkedin.com/candidate-portal.
